Description: AdvanSix agreed to pay a $202,221 penalty in settlement of allegations it had violated its air pollution emission permits in three separate events: a failed stack test, excess VOC emissions, and excess NOx emissions.

NAICS Translation: 325199: All Other Basic Organic Chemical Manufacturing
